OrgName.entry: SHIELD SOUTH YORKSHIRE HIV SUPPORT GROUP

Desc.entry: A registered charity which offers a support service to people living with HIV themselves and their family or friends. Offers holistic support to give clients the opportunity to improve their physical, social and emotional wellbeing. Services include counselling, complementary therapies, key worker support, lunch clubs, women's and men's groups, family days, social trips and celebrations, advice, information and referrals to external agencies, food and toiletries. The centre also provides gym facilities and IT support. Company limited by guarantee no 5980245. Self or any referral.
